description.displayText: Antionette has volunteered with me over the last year in Waumba Land. She is so vibrant, loving and encouraging. I look forward to seeing her every week because I know she will make me smile. Antoinette always strives to do more than her best and she is an excellent team leader. She has many gifts and talents, but what I love most about her is that she shines inside and out with her love for Christ and others. I am so proud to call her a friend.

description.displayText: Always on time. Takes baby out on walks, to playground, or events nearly every day. Very interactive with baby (i.e. lots of floor time). Flexible (able to adjust to our varying schedules).
